author: Staff Reporter
text:
Student washed away

M. Vishnu (29), a second year B.Sc student in an arts college here was washed away in a left bank water canal from Kothaiyar dam at Mangalam near Kulasekaram in Kanyakumari district on Saturday evening.

Vishnu went for bathing after a hectic exercise for joining army or police, along with his friends Merbin (19) and Abinash (19). Vishnu was washed away in the in the canal. His friend Merbin’s bid to safeguard him ended in vain. Fire and Rescue Service personnel found the body washed ashore 2.5 km away from Mangalam.
title: Student washed away in canal
